name: Genex Ally Triarm
description:
"Genex Controller" + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
This card's effects depend on the Attribute(s) of its non-Tuner Synchro Material Monsters. Once per turn, you can discard 1 card to activate one of its effects: â— WIND: Send 1 random card from your opponent's hand to the Graveyard. â— WATER: Select 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field, and destroy it. â— DARK: Select 1 face-up LIGHT monster on the field, destroy it and draw 1 card.
